title: John  Deere's Shocking Tactic Robs Farmers Billions Every Year!

tasks.task: Farmers facing tractor breakdowns and the struggle for repair rights.
subtasks: Changing fuel filters on a tractor.
Realizing the necessity of specialized diagnostic tools for modern tractors.
Explaining the impact of corporate monopolies on farm operations.
Describing historical and current movements for the right to repair.
Detailing legal actions against John Deere, alleging violations of antitrust laws.
Discussing state-level legislation aimed at providing farmers access to necessary repair tools and data.
Addressing the implications of data ownership in the context of agricultural equipment.
Drawing parallels between the auto industry and the agricultural sector's right to repair battles.
Advocating for government and societal support for the right to repair movement.
